scripts.build:css: stylus stylus/main.styl -o static/css/main.css && gzip -c static/css/main.css > static/css/main.css.gz
scripts.build:js: scripts/writeLoadViews.js && browserify client/js/main.js -o static/js/debug.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > static/js/bundle.js && gzip -c static/js/bundle.js > static/js/bundle.js.gz
scripts.build:js-debug: scripts/writeLoadViews.js && browserify client/js/main.js -o static/js/debug.js -x backbone -x jquery -x moment -x underscore -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --ignore [ /node_modules/, /vendor/ ] ] && gzip -c static/js/debug.js > static/js/debug.js.gz
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r backbone -r jquery -r moment -r underscore > static/js/vendor.js && gzip -c static/js/vendor.js > static/js/vendor.js.gz
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run livereload'
